description: The story of the writer Mike Williams, a specialist in paranormal phenomena, he is sent to the dead city of Centralia to search for inspiration, to finish writing your book on the paranormal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7/8/10 Processor: Intel CORE i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 820m Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: 64-Bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows  7/8/10 Processor: Intel CORE i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 920mx Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: 64-Bit
